Submodules¶

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler module¶

class comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.Number[source]¶

Bases: object

All numbers inherit from this class.

If you just want to check if an argument x is a number, without caring what kind, use isinstance(x, Number).

class comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.OneCycleScheduler(optimizer, lr_max, tot_iters, moms=0.95, 0.85, tot_epochs=1, pct_start=0.3, div_factor=25.0, final_div=250000.0, last_epoch=- 1)[source]¶

class comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.Scheduler(vals, n_iter, func=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Used to “step” from start,end (vals) over n_iter iterations on a schedule defined by func

is_done()[source]¶

Return True if schedule completed.

restart()[source]¶
step()[source]¶

Return next value along annealed schedule.

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.annealing_cos(start, end, pct)[source]¶

Cosine anneal from start to end as pct goes from 0.0 to 1.0.

Return type

Number

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.annealing_exp(start, end, pct)[source]¶

Exponentially anneal from start to end as pct goes from 0.0 to 1.0.

Return type

Number

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.annealing_linear(start, end, pct)[source]¶

Linearly anneal from start to end as pct goes from 0.0 to 1.0.

Return type

Number

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.annealing_no(start, end, pct)[source]¶

No annealing, always return start.

Return type

Number

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.annealing_poly(degree)[source]¶

Anneal polynomically from start to end as pct goes from 0.0 to 1.0.

Return type

Number

comet.agent.training.lr_scheduler.do_annealing_poly(start, end, pct, degree)[source]¶

Helper function for anneal_poly.

Return type

Number

comet.agent.training.policy_utils module¶

comet.agent.training.policy_utils.get_action_pd_cls(action_pd_type='Categorical', action_type='discrete')[source]¶

Verify and get the action prob. distribution class for construction Called by body at init to set its own ActionPD

Parameters

  • action_pd_type – ACTION_PDS[action_type]: continuous: Normal, Beta, Gumbel discrete: Categorical, Argmax, GumbelCategorical multi_discrete: MultiCategorical multi_binary: Bernoulli

  • action_type – discrete, multi_discrete, multi_binary

Returns:

comet.agent.training.policy_utils.init_action_pd(pd_param)[source]¶

Initialize the action_pd for discrete or continuous actions: - discrete: action_pd = ActionPD(logits) - continuous: action_pd = ActionPD(loc, scale)

Parameters

pd_param –

Returns:
